title: Setup Performance and Security Testing
description: Configure comprehensive performance and security testing for the Multi-Tenant Appointment Booking System. This includes load testing, security scanning, and performance benchmarking to ensure system reliability and security.

effort_estimate.justification: Setting up performance and security testing requires configuring specialized tools, defining test scenarios, and establishing benchmarks for system reliability and security compliance.

user_stories: As a system administrator, I want performance testing so that the system can handle expected load
As a security officer, I need security testing so that vulnerabilities are identified and addressed
As a QA engineer, I require performance benchmarks so that system quality is maintained
business_rules: Performance testing must validate system under load
Test results must be documented and actionable
edge_cases: Identifying security vulnerabilities in API endpoints
Testing with large datasets and concurrent users

acceptance_criteria: Test results can be analyzed and reported
Performance and security tests run in CI/CD pipeline

blocking_information.blocking_reason: CI/CD pipeline and testing framework must be established first

additional_context.technical_notes: Implement performance testing for the key metrics defined in the PRD. Include security scanning for common vulnerabilities. Ensure testing covers the complete system architecture including all microservices and database components.
additional_context.design_references: Performance requirements from PRD and security architecture from HLD
additional_context.security_considerations: Perform security testing including OWASP Top 10 vulnerability assessments and penetration testing
